data.actual_result: users name over laps the SEND button
data.expected_result: The name should stop before it hits the SEND button
data.short_description: If a users name is really long on the new "add a friend" screen, the name will over lap the SEND button (keep in mind the new model is only available for certain people)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your friends tab  - Click the "suggestions" button  - click the wumpus or click the ADD A FRIEND button - you can either scroll until you find someone or look them up
